altTitles.ja: 私たちは凸凹している

description.en: "I don't need a man! I live to work!" Saki, who works as a designer at a men's clothing company, is an Arasa girl (Japanese-made English expression that refers to a lady around her thirties.) who loves her work. However, she was surprised that she wasn't able to progress in her career as easily as she would have been as a man, which makes her feel depressed. One day, she gets drunk and meets a younger man named Akira who is struggling with his own problems as well. Where does the love start between a woman and a man who both face difficulties in their professional lives?
description.ja:
「男は要らない！仕事に生きる!!」
メンズ服を手掛けるアパレルメーカーでデザイナーとして働くサキは仕事に野心を燃やすアラサー女子。しかし意外にも男社会なアパレル業界ではキャリアはなかなか伸びず苦悩する日々だった。ある日、酔いつぶれたサキはアキラと名乗る年下の男の子と運命的な出会いを果たす。転がるように恋に落ちたサキだったが、アキラは目には見えない障害を抱えていた――。
誰もが違う個性を持って生きている。生きづらさを抱える男女の恋の行方は…！？

biography.en:
Favorite Things: movies, oil paintings, cacti, cats, sake, Aya Kouda, Gorey, Chihiro Onitsuka, etc.

Least Favorite Things: sweet things, working digitally

Debut work was "House of Flowers" in 2003, which was seriealized in "The LaLa Melody" magazine.
